name: Indigo X Kalen Iwamoto and Julien Silvano

metadata.name: D/is/play
metadata.collection: Indigo X Kalen Iwamoto and Julien Silvano
metadata.description: This work plays with the letters in the word “indigo” to provoke perceptual shifts about language. Using the Greek delta/prism as frame, the work presents letters in different guises. The rotation of the triangle (a symbol of change in math) gives birth to a plethora of meanings and identities.
